faq.title: Questions we hear often
faq.intro: Short answers rooted in ICF coaching. Ask more during the intro call if anything is unclear.

items.question: What happens in the intro call?
items.answer: We spend 20 minutes hearing your context, sharing scope and boundaries, and deciding together if coaching helps now.

items.question: Do you give advice or plans?
items.answer: We offer questions, reflections, and experiments. You choose actions and remain the decision-maker.

items.question: Can I switch languages mid-session?
items.answer: Yes. You are welcome to move between English, 繁體中文, and 简体中文 whenever it supports your thinking.

items.question: Is this therapy or legal guidance?
items.answer: No. We provide coaching only and signpost other professionals when therapy, legal, medical, or immigration support is needed.
